name: Call Of Booty (itch)
description:
When The One Game You Play Isn't As Good As This Masterpiece, This Is Where Call Of Booty Comes In!

Call Of Booty.. Never Heard Of It? It's A Simple First Person Shooter Game Made By A Few Friends, What Makes This Sound Better Is The Multiplayer Implemented Into The Game, So Call Up The Bois Because It's About To Be A Throwdown In Call Of Booty

Credits:

Programming: FraserGameDev

Modelling: Fionn, Sean

Game Testers: Liam, Ben, Scott
